content.title: Pattern 1: Onboarding & First-Run Experience
content.description: Addresses the 15-20 minute setup problem killing retention. Covers time-to-value, progressive disclosure, guest/browse mode, and smart defaults. Key metric: 30-day retention trending to 0%.

content.title: Pattern 2: Content Discovery & Feed Quality
content.description: Solves the empty feed problem. 'Traditional apps win by having much better content selection.' Covers algorithmic feeds, cold start solutions, search, trending, and growth loops.
keyMetrics: Target: >20 posts viewed in first session

content.title: Pattern 3: Core Interaction Loops
content.description: Makes basic actions (post, like, zap, follow) reliable. Addresses posts getting stuck, reactions failing, relay downtime causing content loss, catastrophic follow list destruction.

content.title: Pattern 4: Performance & Perceived Speed
content.description: Optimistic UI, loading states, perceived performance. Addresses 'slow and clunky' perception, crashes, battery drain, database bottlenecks.
keyMetrics: 32% bounce rate increase from 1-3s load time

content.title: Pattern 5: Progressive Complexity
content.description: Hides advanced features from beginners. Addresses overwhelming relay selection, key management, NIP configurations shown upfront. Smart defaults over configuration.
keyMetrics: 80% of users use only 20% of features
30-40% cognitive load reduction via progressive disclosure

content.title: Pattern 6: Cross-Client Consistency & Data Integrity
content.description: Most severe UX failure - users losing all follows when switching clients. Data integrity, sync state visibility, conflict resolution, offline support.
keyMetrics: Race conditions causing catastrophic follow list destruction
